title: SEBIâ€™s circular on loan default disclosure norms may be put on hold for now
description: The Securities and Exchange Board of India may not be coming out with a circular on loan default disclosure norms any time soon as mounting pressure from banks has made the markets regulator bury it for now, sources told Moneycontrol.

title: Rupee rebounds to 1-wk high of 65.01; zooms 49 paise
description: The rupee was under severe pressure last week and touched a 6-1/2 month low 65.89 during intra-day.

title: Trade Setup for Thursday: Top 10 things you should know before Opening Bell
description: Despite no rate cut from the RBI, the positive reaction from the market participants should augur well for bulls going forward in consolidating their gains further towards 10,000 levels.

title: Bonds decline, call rates end lower
description: Government bonds (G-Secs) declined on selling pressure from banks and corporates and the overnight call money rates also ended lower owing to poor offtake from borrowing banks amid ample liquidity in the banking system.

title: Technical View: Nifty forms a bullish candle; keep a stop loss below 9,850
description: The Nifty index rose for the fourth consecutive day to an intraday high of 9,938. It has been making higher highs and higher lows from the last three trading sessions.

title: Market closes higher for 4th straight day, Sensex up 170 pts; Nifty above 9900
description: Market closes higher for 4th straight day, Sensex up 170 pts; Nifty above 9900
